problems.title: Sum of First N Natural Numbers (Recursive)
problems.description:
Compute the sum of first N natural numbers using recursion. That is, 1 + 2 + ... + N.

Input Format:
A single integer N.

Output Format:
Print a single integer representing the sum.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5

Sample Output
15

Sample Input
1

Sample Output
1
hintsList: Base case: if n == 1 return 1. Recursive case: n + sumN(n-1).
